post:
Hosteons.com - We are a registered company from Singapore with servers hosted LA, USA.

We are using Pure SSD RAID 10 for all our VPS Nodes.

We are using SolusVM along with KVM for virtualisation. With complete access to RDNS, Reboot, Reinstall, also all our VPS comes with a free /64 IPv6 per VPS in addition to the IPv4 allocation as per your VPS Package. Our VPS also comes with Free DDOS Protection.

Our VPS comes with Java as well as HTML 5 VNC

Here are some of our VPS Packages:<br>

VPS Starting at just $2.4 per month (use coupon “INTRO20” to get 20% discount one time discount on all billing cycles)


Coupon/offer details for all VPS Packages:
“INTRO20” - This coupon gives 20% one discount on all billing cycles (Annual billing cycle gives you additional 25% discount)

“DOUBLERAM” - This coupon will give you DOUBLE RAM, after placing order using this coupon code just submit a support ticket to DOUBLE your VPS RAM)

CUSTOM VPS: (You can Design your own VPS Package, select as much RAM, CPU Core, IP, Disk Space you want)

You can order custom vps from - [https://my.hosteons.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=35](https://my.hosteons.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=35)<br>
